name: queue
description: asynchronous function queue with adjustable concurrency

scripts.test-browser: standard && browserify test/index.js > test/bundle.js && echo "open test/index.html in your browser"
scripts.travis: standard && istanbul cover test --report lcovonly && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.travis-ts: tsc test/typescript.ts --m System --out /dev/null && echo 'TypeScript compilation passed.'

author: Jesse Tane <jesse.tane@gmail.com>
